drivers

Class DriverService

  • java.lang.Object
    • drivers.DriverService

  • public class DriverService
extends java.lang.Object
    KeywordProvider helper for creating and managing WebDrivers
    Author:
    Mathew Carrigan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DriverService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createChromeDriver()
      Creates a new ChromeDriver with default ChromeOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createChromeDriver(org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions options)
      Creates a new ChromeDriver with provided ChromeOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createFirefoxDriver()
      Creates a new FirefoxDriver with default FirefoxOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createFirefoxDriver(org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions options)
      Creates a new FirefoxDriver with provided FirefoxOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createFirefoxDriver(org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxProfile profile)
      Creates a new FirefoxDriver with provided FirefoxProfile Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getBrowser()
      Reads the Maven SureFire SystemProperties to get which WebDriver to create and creates it

    • Method Detail

      • getBrowser

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getBrowser()
                                         throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Reads the Maven SureFire SystemProperties to get which WebDriver to create and creates it
        Returns:
        WebDriver of type specified in Maven SureFire SystemProperties
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if Grid Hub Url is not valid

      • createChromeDriver

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createChromeDriver()

        Creates a new ChromeDriver with default ChromeOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
        Returns:
        ChromeDriver WebDriver
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if Grid Hub URL is not valid

                                                 throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Creates a new ChromeDriver with provided ChromeOptions Looks at the Maven SureFire plugin System Properties to determine whether to run local or not and whether to add any custom DriverOptions Arguments
        Parameters:
        options - ChromeOptions to include with the ChromeDriver
        Returns:
        ChromeDriver WebDriver
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if Grid Hub URL is not valid
